reviews.review_msg: Peter was probably the best first year professor I have ever had. I would highly recommend taking a first year course with him.

Super nice prof! If you love quirky people who are hilarious, this is the best prof for you! Attendance isn't really mandatory for the lectures since he reads them outloud, but the way he reads them and expands on them (plus his jokes) are worth attending the lecs for. Tutorials are SUPER necessary- that's the key to a good grade. Awesome class tho
easy pass but hard to get a high mark. The key is your tutorial.
Don't take Nadine Flagel, worst English Prof. Not at all helpful.

Enthusiastic, energetic and hilarious. Dr. Budra's utilizes modern pop culture to explain concepts in class which is awesome. Encourages questions during class and his notes are always straightforward and to the point. My only gripe is that there are very few opportunities to boost your grade in this class (2 essays and a final).

Diana Solomon is a good ENGL113W professor. She genuinely cares for the success of her students. Attendance is mandatory because she doesn't post the lecture slides on canvas. There's only 2 1000-word papers, so the workload is pretty low. The final is quite easy too - NO ESSAY QUESTIONS! I didn't get lucky enough with my TA, so pray for a good one

Diana was the best prof I had this term. Her passion for English drama during lectures was contagious. Her rubrics clearly outlined the expectations for papers, and the final exam rewarded students who showed up in class. Always kept promises about posting information and grades online. Organized, reasonable and encouraging -- highly recommended!

Nice prof although I usually skip her classes because there're  lecture recordings online. I didn't read most of the plays until the day before final exam, and I still get 80% on final exam. There are no assignment and quizzes, only 2 papers and one final. Overall, this class is an easy W class, definitely recommend it if you need a W credit.
She is a good prof. Doesnt post lec notes so its helpful to come to class. She tests on the stuff she speaks. 2 Papers and a final. Exams are fair/easy. Overall, good class to take with this prof
